item.title: C++ Exception Handling Best Practices: 7 Things To Know
item.description: Exception handling in C++ is a well-unschooled topic if you observe initial stages of the learning curve. There are numerous tutorials available online on exception handling in C++. But few explains what you should not do & intricacies around it. So here I am to bridge the gap & show you some intricacies, from where & why you should not throw an exception and C++ exception handling best practices. Along with some newer features introduced for exception handling in Modern C++ with example.
